title: LEVEL ME UP SCOTTY!
subtitle: Node.jsでのデータベースについて

mod.broken: An error occured while loading the module
mod.not_long_enough:
The module doesn't have enough arguments, it has to look like:

    function (db, key, callback) {...}
mod.not_function: The module doesn't return a function
mod.unexpected: An error occured while executing the module
mod.not_object: The module doesn't return an object

error.timeout: Timeout: The module didn't respond after 10 seconds.
error.not_same: The output of the module doesn't match the expected output

db.not_closed:
The database directory is still locked!

Close it with `db.close(function () {})`
